Commands.Shine Edge: 1-HIT magic BRV+HP attack  Grants 「Small Max BRV Up」 for 2 turns
Commands.Runic: Raises BRV by 50% of Initial BRV  Grants 「Magic BRV Absorb」 for 2 turns  Casts 「Target Lock」 on target for 2 turns
Commands.Set Target Lock All: Casts 「Target Lock」 on all enemies for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Spinning Edge: 5-HIT magic BRV+HP attack  Grants 「Rune Knight」 and 「Medium Attack Up」 for 5 turns   「Rune Knight」 has the following effects:  - Raises Magic Attack  - Grants BRV & HP Regen

Passives.Shine Edge Light: Slightly lowers Action Delay after using  Shine Edge
Passives.HP Damage Guard: Slightly raises Defense after taking HP damage
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50% of Max BRV
Passives.Runic Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using  Runic
Passives.BRV Live: Prevents BREAK status when BRV is over 50% of Max BRV
Passives.HP Damage BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after taking HP damage
Passives.Target Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when attacking an enemy targeting self
Passives.Pride of the Invincible General: Prevents KO if HP is over 50% of Max HP and leaves its value at 1
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Shine Edge Extend: Shine Edge  use +1When using  Shine Edge :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 5- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Converts 30% HP damage dealt to BRV- Extends the duration of effects granted after use by 2 turns
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed All: Slightly raises party Max BRV and Speed while buffed
Passives.Runic Extend: Runic  use +4When using  Runic :- Greatly raises the BRV Gain based on Initial BRV and provides it to the whole party- Triggers a 1-HIT magic BRV+HP attack after the BRV Gain- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Converts 30% HP damage dealt to BRV-  Magic BRV Absorb  buff becomes level based (max is 5)   Raises own Max BRV based on level   Level increases by 1 after absorbing a magic BRV attack   Lowers magic BRV damage taken by allies (effect not based on level)- Extends the duration of effects granted after use by 2 turns- Lowers Action DelayWhile  Magic BRV Absorb  is active:- Turns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+    1-HIT magic BRV+HP attack   BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV   Converts 10% HP damage dealt to BRV
Passives.Radiance of Bravery and Destruction: Raises Initial BRV and Max BRV by 20%
Passives.Set Target Lock All Extend: When using  Set Target Lock All , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises party Max BRV for 5 turns

Weapons.Lightbringer CP: 35: When using  Runic :- Raises the BRV gain based on Initial BRV- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+  for 4 turns   1-HIT Ice magic BRV attack- Grants  Small Attack Up  for 4 turns- Extends the duration of  Magic BRV Absorb  and  Target Lock
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Set Target Lock All  use +1When using  Set Target Lock All :- Duration of  Target Lock  +2 turns
Weapons.Crystal Sword CP: 15: When using  Shine Edge :- Raises BRV potency- Grants HP Regen for 4 turns- Improves  Max BRV Up  buff and extends its duration
Weapons.Stoneblade CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Spinning Edge
